# <a name="create-an-email-signature-in-outlook-on-the-web"></a><span data-ttu-id="af953-102">在 web 上的 Outlook 中建立電子郵件簽名</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af953-102">Create an email signature in Outlook on the web</span></span>

1. <span data-ttu-id="af953-103">跳至</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af953-103">Go to</span></span> <img src='data:image/png;base64,' />
 <span data-ttu-id="af953-104">**設定** > 會**顯示所有 Outlook 設定** > **撰寫及回復**。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af953-104">**Settings** > **View all Outlook settings** > **Compose and reply**.</span></span>
1. <span data-ttu-id="af953-105">在 [**電子郵件簽名**] 底下，輸入您的簽章並使用可用的格式設定選項，以變更其外觀。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af953-105">Under **Email signature**, type your signature and use the available formatting options to change its appearance.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="af953-106">*附注：* 每個帳戶只能有一個簽名。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af953-106">*Note:* You can have only one signature per account.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="af953-107">若要深入瞭解，請參閱[在 Outlook 網頁版中建立及新增電子郵件簽名](https://support.office.com/article/5ff9dcfd-d3f1-447b-b2e9-39f91b074ea3)。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="af953-107">To learn more, see [Create and add an email signature in Outlook on the web](https://support.office.com/article/5ff9dcfd-d3f1-447b-b2e9-39f91b074ea3).</span></span>
